State.Author: Virnetch
State.Description: Allows highlighting and hiding quests in the Journal questlist. Shift-Click on a quest to highlight it, Shift-Click again to hide and Shift-Click a third time to return to normal.
State.Name: Better Questlist

State.Author: abot
State.Description: real time travel Vivec gondoliers
State.Name: Gondoliers

State.Author: OAAB_Data Team
State.Description: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.
State.Name: OAAB_Data

State.Author: Merzasphor
State.Description: This mod makes the game treat skill increases from quests as if there were raised via normal means.
State.Name: Quest Skill Reward Fix

State.Author: Champion of Hircine
State.Description: Replaces 43 models for the Telvanni set
State.Name: Telvanni Mesh Improvement

State.Author: PikachunoTM
State.Description: An attempt to fix the many issues present in Bethesda's original Official Plugins. Includes fixes for all of the Official Plugins, and offers merged and compatibility options as well.
State.Name: Unofficial Morrowind Official Plugins Patched

State.Author: Heinrich Guil
State.Description: An ultimate true to the original style body replacer.
State.Name: VSBR Vanilla style body replacer

State.Author: abot - Arcimaestro Antares
State.Description: You can travel by boat, ship and river strider in real time, and dismount anywhere in between trip starting and ending points
State.Name: Boats

State.Author: ZWolol
State.Description: It is idle time Replacer, correcting lacks of standard models in the form of UV mapping, ledges and cracks.
State.Name: Correct Meshes

State.Author: Articus - QwertyQuit - Pherim
State.Description: Replaces textures and models of various flora with HQ quality.
State.Name: Epic Plants

State.Author: EJ12 Petethegoat
State.Description: Sick of getting caught on those bastard degenerate rope fences? No more!
State.Name: Fix those bastard rope fences

State.Author: PoodleSandwich
State.Description: Flames are now glow mapped and/or properly illuminated.
State.Name: Glowing Flames

State.Author: Pherim - Stuporstar - Remiros - Reizeron
State.Description: A compilation of weapon mesh mods, made to simplify installation, compatibility, and selection of various options. Weapon Sheathing meshes included.
State.Name: Improved Weapon Mesh Compilation

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: This is a UI replacement for Morrowind, intending to completely replace all UI elements in the game. I have packaged everything in a modular way so you can pick and choose which aspects of UI Remastered you'd like to use.
State.Name: Kezyma's UI Remastered

State.Author: Slartibartfast
State.Description:
This mod is plugin-less mesh replacer containing a collection of 121 of Morrowinds 
original meshes that have had various issues corrected or improved on.
State.Name: Mesh Fix

State.Author: Hrnchamd
State.Description: Morrowind Graphics Extender XE; allows Morrowind to render distant views, scenery shadows, high quality shaders and other features. Mods the vanilla engine, not usable with OpenMW.
State.Name: MGE XE

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

State.Author: MOP Team
State.Description: Greatly improves performance and fixes tons of mesh errors.
State.Name: Morrowind Optimization Patch

State.Author: Petethegoat
State.Description: Uses MWSE Lua to add an Oblivion style ownership indicator, when you look at owned items, beds, and more.
State.Name: Ownership Indicator

State.Author: TES3 Community
State.Description: Patch for Purists is an unofficial patch for The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind Game of the Year Edition which attempts to continue where the latest official version of the game left off. Over 9000+ bugs still present in the game have been fixed.
State.Name: Patch for Purists

State.Author: NZdawghaus
State.Description: This is a repost of NZdawghaus' original Wide Screen Splash Replacer files. It is posted with direct specific permission from NZdawghaus. Gives 16:9 versions of vanilla Splash Screens.
State.Name: Wide Screen Splash Replacer

Original.Name: Wrye Mash 2019 - x64 -  manual installation archive.-45439-v100-1572029142.7z

State.Author: Polemos
State.Description: A stand alone edition of Wrye Mash, based on the latest Yacoby source. The "editing the file header" bug is fixed and retains all the extra functionality like drag and drop. It supports MGE XE, mlox, TES3cmd, TES3llint, MWSE and many more new features like: Menubar, mod order snaps, UNICODE, BSA support  and more. Tested on WinXP, Win7 x64, Win10
State.Name: Wrye Mash - Polemos fork  - 2021

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: Hrnchamd
State.Description: A high resolution replacer for Morrowind\'s Magic Cards font, used in most of the UI - menus, dialogue and the journal.
State.Name: Better Dialogue Font

State.Author: Tarius
State.Description: This improves different meshes.
State.Name: Better Meshes plus Optimization

State.Author: Resdayn Revival Team
State.Description: Properly smoothed vanilla meshes
State.Name: RR Mod Series - Better Meshes

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: New effects and textures for TES3 Morrowind waterfalls.
State.Name: Better Waterfalls

State.Author: Nich
State.Description:
This plugin corrects the UV mapping on the stones. Now they will not be seams and blurred images

I added some lower parts to some stones.
State.Name: Correct UV Rocks

State.Author: rot
State.Description: Restores visual effects on creatures.
State.Name: Creature VFX restoration

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: This mod replaces all of the Dunmer lanterns (including the paper lanterns and streetlight) from the original game with smoother, more detailed versions (yet not with a ridiculous amount of new polies: they're optimized).
State.Name: Dunmer Lanterns Replacer

State.Author: Champion of Hircine
State.Description: Replaces models in the Dwemer set.
State.Name: Dwemer Mesh Improvement

State.Author: Caleb AKA me
State.Description: An in-depth yet completely vanilla friendly touch up of every head and almost every hair (a few looked okay) in the game. Hopefully breathes new life into the character's appearances for diehard vanilla purists and people just looking for a decent upgrade to the old heads.
State.Name: Familiar Faces by Caleb (Updated)

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk and NullCascade
State.Description: This is a modern, pluginless replacement of the old Windows Glow mods with many more features besides! Windows Glow suffered from every mod needing a patch to work with it. Glow in the Dahrk handles this automatically through the meshes themselves with a powerful code by NullCascade which can switch the visible portion of meshes on the fly.
State.Name: Glow in the Dahrk

State.Author: Stuporstar and Greatness7
State.Description: Now works with OpenMW! MWSE Graphic Herbalism harnesses the power of lua and mesh switchnodes, allowing this mod to be run without an esp or standard scripts. This dramatically optimizes performance compared to older graphic herbalism mods. It also comes with an mod configuration menu to allow you to change settings.
State.Name: Graphic Herbalism - MWSE and OpenMW Edition

State.Author: Pherim - YarYulme - Daedra von OpenSource
State.Description: Improved meshes for ALL shields! Defend yourself... with style!
State.Name: Improved Shield Meshes

State.Author: Krokantor
State.Description: Krokantor's improved water shader for MGE XE. Updated to be compatible with MGE XE 0.13.0.
State.Name: Krokantor's Enhanced Water Shader Updated

State.Author: Armed_Defender
State.Description: A simple mesh replacer that replaces some of the older meshes in Morrowind. Good to use in conjunction with a texture replacer.
State.Name: Mesh Improvements

State.Author: Lord Berandas
State.Description: More detailes meshes for "com" and "de" dock pieces and others.
State.Name: MOAR Mesh Replacers

State.Author: qqqbbb
State.Description: This mod adds open/close animation to containers
State.Name: Morrowind Containers Animated

State.Author: Project Enhance
State.Description: Upscales every in-game texture with the help of machine learning. 100% vanilla-friendly.
State.Name: Morrowind Enhanced Textures

State.Author: KalianMods and Taddeus
State.Description: This mod adds a mountainous landscape behind the walls of Mournhold.
State.Name: Mountains of Mournhold

Original.Name: New Best Bodies by Liztail - Clean-47678-3-3-1583853195.zip

State.Author: Liztail
State.Description:
Since Liztail seems to be MIA and planetelderscrolls and modhistory/fliggerty downloads are unavailable (atleast for this mod) I took the liberty of uploading this here.



I DID NOT CREATE THIS MOD.

I fished this from google wayback machine from modhistory.



All credits go to Liztail.
State.Name: New Beast Bodies by Liztail

State.Author: OAAB_Data Team
State.Description: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.
State.Name: OAAB_Data

State.Author: OAAB_Data Team
State.Description: OAAB_Data is a free-to-use asset repository for the Morrowind Community.
State.Name: OAAB_Data

State.Author: Psymoniser
State.Description: This replaces the meshes of the oriental styled weapons in Morrowind with slightly higher polycount versions. They still use Bethesda stock textures so they look different depending on what texture replacer you are running. This mod is designed to be plugin-less and so, just contains meshes, there are no textures and no esp\'s.
State.Name: Oriental Mesh Improvements

State.Author: Stuporstar
State.Description: This graphic replacer covers tons of misc items, furniture, lights, and some containers. They are manually smoothed vanilla meshes or remade from scratch, keeping the same UVs (with fixes) and footprint of the original meshes.
State.Name: Properly Smoothed Meshes

State.Author: Remiros - Vtastek - Hrnchamd - Greatness7
State.Description: Adds groundcover to almost all regions
State.Name: Remiros' Groundcover

State.Author: Resdayn Revival Team
State.Description: Properly smoothed vanilla meshes
State.Name: RR Mod Series - Better Meshes

State.Author: PeterBitt
State.Description:
Yet another Signpost replacer! 



This makes the signs in Vvardenfell readable with vanilla friendly textures. No sign looks the same. Colors, font and resolution blend in with original MW graphics.



Signposts Retextured comes in two variants (1.2 and 2.0) and for each of them a "Tamriel Rebuilt: Sacred East" addo
State.Name: Signposts Retextured

State.Author: Merlord
State.Description: Toggle lights on and off. Town lights turn off during the day. Lights no longer destroyed underwater. Lanterns aren't destroyed when they run out of fuel. Refill lanterns with candles and lamps with oil.
State.Name: The Midnight Oil - Lighting Overhaul

State.Author: NullCascade
State.Description: Expands UI functionality with searching, filtering, and more visual feedback.
State.Name: UI Expansion

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk and Greatness7
State.Description: This mod adds floating dust to areas where dead are entombed similar to what is seen in Skyrim barrows. Inspired by an unused texture, these particles will appear in multiple tomb-like cell-types in the game or mods thanks to the included MWSE code. This has been extensively optimized such that minimal to no performance loss is expected.
State.Name: Unto Dust

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: TES3 Community
State.Description: Makes unreadied weapons appear on the character's hip or back.
State.Name: Weapon Sheathing

State.Author: Petethegoat
State.Description: Adds a continue button to the main menu, to instantly load your most recent save.
State.Name: Continue

State.Author: NullCascade
State.Description: Ensures that your followers get warped to you if they get too far away. Compatible with any follower from any mod, without any special script attached to that NPC.
State.Name: Easy Escort

State.Author: abot
State.Description: Actors Footprints
State.Name: Footprints

State.Author: GrunTella
State.Description: Picking a glowing plant using Graphic Herbalism will also remove the glow-light. Designed for use with the MWSE version of Graphic Herbalism.
State.Name: Graphic Herbalism Lighting

State.Author: Anumaril21
State.Description: MWSE Magicka Regen provides functional and configurable magicka regeneration for the player, NPCs, and creatures within Morrowind.
State.Name: MWSE Magicka Regen

State.Author: LondonRook and Greatness7
State.Description: This mod changes the passageways between the different city districts, making the transitions more immersive.
State.Name: Open Mournhold

State.Author: abot
State.Description: I wanted to travel Morrowind on top of a real Silt Strider so strongly, and after years waiting for some similar mod to be completed, I decided to try myself.
State.Name: Silt Striders

State.Author: tewlwolow
State.Description: MWSE-Lua 3D clouds and mist.
State.Name: Vapourmist - A Cloud and Mist Mod

State.Author: tewlwolow
State.Description: A weather overhaul with randomised cloud textures, weather changes in interiors, seasonal weather, latitude/season changes etc.
State.Name: Watch the Skies - Dynamic Weather and Sky Effects

State.Author: tewlwolow and stanliqubit
State.Description: Lua-based sound overhaul. Ambient sounds, interior weather, extended voices, and more. Compatible with TR/PT/SHotN. Easily customisable.
State.Name: AURA - A Sound Overhaul Mod

State.Author: Von Djangos
State.Description: Enables over 100 lines of voiced dialogue for shopkeepers that were shipped with the original game but never used.
State.Name: Great Service

State.Author: herbert100
State.Description: Lua library that includes a new logger, a way to automate the creation of Classes (supporting multiple inheritence, instance checking, and some dataclass-like functionality), and a way to generate polynomial splines. Requires MWSE-lua, but several parts of this should be compatible with OpenMW-lua.
State.Name: herbert lib

State.Author: Merzasphor
State.Description: This mod attempts to preserve vanilla leveling mechanics while eliminating the need to micromanage skill and attribute increases in order to achieve optimal character progression.
State.Name: Improved Vanilla Leveling

State.Author: Merzasphor
State.Description: This mod fixes a bug where GMST values are not applied properly when raising a skill via NPC training or a skill book.
State.Name: Skill Increase GMST Fix

State.Author: Kezyma - tewlwolow
State.Description: A project to fully voice Morrowind using ElevenAI and MWSE. Comes with an optional 'greetings-only' mode and is easily extensible to add compatibility with other mods with no knowledge of scripting or the CS and no additional esp.
State.Name: Kezyma's Voices of Vvardenfell

State.Author: herbert100
State.Description: QuickLoot, with many new features and a revamped UI. Pick up one item from a stack, see item prices and weights, pickup nearby items. Dedicated menus for bartering, pickpocketing, plants, and training, each with their own features and options. Highly customizable. Based on mort's QuickLoot mod. Requires MWSE.
State.Name: More QuickLoot

State.Author: gaddgadd
State.Description: Simply changes Magas Volar/Daedric Sanctuary amulet to fit how I think Bethesda envisioned it.
State.Name: Daedric Sanctuary Fix

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: This mod fixes Bethesda's overly enthusiastic expansion hooks by delaying the Dark Brotherhood attacks (for Tribunal) and limiting intrustive dialogue topics to a few NPCs (Bloodmoon).
State.Name: Expansion Delay

State.Author: Hrnchamd
State.Description: Patches bugs in the Morrowind program, which cannot otherwise be fixed by editing scripts or data files. Cures many crash and save corruption problems.
State.Name: Morrowind Code Patch

State.Author: DassiD
State.Description: A complete shader suite for upgrading your visuals.
State.Name: Morrowind Graphics Guide Shaders

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: Remiros
State.Description: Gives the Skeleton Key infinite uses (yes, infinite) and a unique tooltip to reflect this.
State.Name: Actually Unlimited Skeleton Key

State.Author: abot
State.Description: several new options for journal pages and quests list
State.Name: Smart Journal

State.Author: abot
State.Description: Rain splashes should appear here and there around player when it is raining.
State.Name: RainSplash

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: Adds falling spores particle effects to the iconic emperor parasol mushrooms.
State.Name: Parasol Particles

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: herbert
State.Description: Based on qqqbbb's original mod, rewritten with a focus on interopability and stability. It is now considerably easier for other mods to play open/close animations.
State.Name: Animated Containers Rewritten

State.Author: Merlord
State.Description: Dropped items and corpses are automatically positioned and oriented to align with the ground.
State.Name: Just Drop It

State.Author: Hrnchamd
State.Description: The life of a marksman is one of advantage. Distance, time, initiative. But, when it's all over there is no trace of your work. Wouldn't it be satisfying to see your arrows, bolts and darts sticking into men, mer, tavern doors, and signposts alike? This mod is for you. Place an arrow right between their eyes.
State.Name: Pincushion

State.Author: abot
State.Description: Visible equipped amulets & rings
State.Name: Vanity

State.Author: Darknut
State.Description:
Darknut's 1st Person Enhanced Lite  By Darknut 2-14-16



Version 1



This mod Adds the Swim Animations to the Vanilla the 1st person animations.



The affect is more realistic 1st person.



This mod only effects 1st person animation.
State.Name: Darknut's 1st Person Enhanced Lite

Original.Name: Animated Main Menu for Skyrim UI Overhaul for Morrowind-43341-1-0.zip

State.Author: Mikeandike
State.Description: Replaces the Morrowind main menu with an animated image made to fit the Skyrim UI for Morrowind mod. Requires MGXE.
State.Name: Animated Main Menu for Morrowind

State.Author: vtastek and tewlwolow
State.Description: Adds a heat haze shader controlled by MGE XE and MWSE-lua.
State.Name: Heat Haze - A MGE XE Shader Mod

State.Author: Merlord
State.Description: Keep track of what books you have read by showing a "(Read)" indicator next to their names. You can also see a list of previously read books in the MCM menu.
State.Name: Book Worm

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: This mod restores diseases by assigning them to existing creatures and fixes some other (disease) inconsistencies, in accordance with in-game dialogue.
State.Name: Diseases Restored

State.Author: NullCascade
State.Description: Have issues with the game crashing on exit? This might help!
State.Name: Expeditious Exit

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: A small tool to be included in Wabbajack modlists that allows for automation of some post-install steps, designed to make installing lists marginally simpler for users.
State.Name: Kezyma's Wabbajack Post-Setup Tool

State.Author: hardek
State.Description: A high resolution replacement for the Daedric font used in scrolls.
State.Name: Better Daedric Font

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: abot
State.Description: Avoid actors getting stuck while opening doors
State.Name: Doors Anti Stuck

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: Makes the Willpower stat less fucking useless by fixing the spell resist mechanics. Requires MWSE 2.1-dev.
State.Name: Putting Power In Willpower 2 - Antimagic Boogaloo

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: Restores previously unused Silt Strider animation.
State.Name: Silt Strider Animation Restored

Original.Name: MGE XE - Distant Land Generation Texture Error Fix-45588-1-0.7z

State.Author: Slartibartfast
State.Description: This mod gets rid of texture error messages which occur during the distant land generation phase when using the latest version of Morrowind MGE XE version (0.10.0b24) and newer - probably
State.Name: MGE XE - Distant Land Generation Texture Error Fix

State.Author: darkfri
State.Description: Revamping of some meshes of Dwemer Mesh Improvement to look closer to vanilla.
State.Name: Dwemer Mesh Improvement - Revamped

State.Author: Greatness7
State.Description: Adds animation blending to Morrowind, enabling smooth transitions between animations.
State.Name: Animation Blending

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: With this mod, if you visit a dwemer ruin during a thunderstorm, you'll be greeted by blinding flashes as lightning strikes the steamstack lightning rods from the vanilla game. But be careful not to get too close lest you be shocked!
State.Name: Dwemer Lightning Rods

State.Author: Greatness7 and NullCascade
State.Description: Dynamically adds ash decals to people, places, things, and probably concepts during ash storms.
State.Name: Fallen Ash

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: This mod enhances the ambiance of the Bitter Coast by adding a new mist effect throughout region which appears during the night and certain weather conditions. It will burn off in the morning sun. The effect has been optimized to minimize performance impact. The mod also includes an optional replacer for the vanilla effect.
State.Name: Mistify

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description:
"...the door is only seen at dawn and dusk, and the star is the 'key' that opens it." - Nibani Maesa

To align with what the in game dialogue suggests, the entrance to the Cavern of the Incarnate will now only be visible during the magical hours of twilight.
State.Name: The Dream is the Door

Original.Name: Cutscenes Revamped - Cavern of the Incarnate-49126-1-3-1607925544.7z

State.Author: DarkKnight040802
State.Description: A modern HD replacer for the Azura Cutscene that plays in the Cavern of the Incarnate. Works with Morrowind and OpenMW.
State.Name: Cutscenes Revamped - Cavern of the Incarnate

State.Author: See GitHub
State.Description: A tool for automatically patching conflicts between mods for TES3: Morrowind.
State.Name: TES3Merge

State.Author: EnvyDeveloper
State.Description: A small mod which adds distant buildings to Mournhold. So you can see the temple from almost any part of the city.
State.Name: Distant Mournhold

State.Author: Chesko
State.Description: An HD recreation of the original Intro Cinematic.
State.Name: HD Intro Cinematic - English

State.Author: Markelius
State.Description: Cleaned up Bethesda logo in HD
State.Name: Morrowind Bethesda logo HD makeover

State.Author: rfuzzo
State.Description: This mod adds compare tooltips for looked-at or equipped items against the equipped item of the same category. The mod has multiple MCM options to configure the comparison style.
State.Name: MWSE Compare Tooltips

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: A small tool to be included in Wabbajack modlists that allows for automation of some post-install steps, designed to make installing lists marginally simpler for users.
State.Name: Kezyma's Wabbajack Post-Setup Tool

State.Author: Stripes
State.Description: Adds a simple script to make Vivec properly loop his idle animation
State.Name: Buoyant Lord Vivec

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk and Greatness7
State.Description: This mod uses a previously unused keg droplet texture from the game files to add a new effect to select kegstands in the game. Now you might notice a leaky tap upon closer inspection just like Bethesda may have intended with this texture but never followed through on. Includes a dynamic MWSE and non-MWSE versions.
State.Name: Keg Drip

State.Author: Phobos
State.Description: HD Title Screen and Logo Video.
State.Name: Title Screen and Logo Video Intro Reworked.

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: Adds entrance bell chimes with sound effects to imperial town tradehouses and taverns.
State.Name: Store Entrance Chimes

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: This is an MWSE plugin for Morrowind that aims to provide modernised versions of vanilla mechanics in Morrowind. The plugin is fully modular and each feature can be toggled through the Mod Configuration Menu. Features Always Hit & Cast, Health & Magicka Regen, Uncapped & Persistent Attribute Bonuses, State-Based Health, and Fast Travel.
State.Name: Kezyma's Mechanics Remastered

State.Author: Merlord
State.Description: Holding down a hotkey (default left shift) while clicking an item in your inventory will equip that item instead of picking it up. Uses MWSE+Lua.
State.Name: Quick Equip

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: This mod fixes another one of Beth's oversights. One of MW's quests has voiced dialogue that sends you to a totally different location than where the quest actually takes place. I just put the cave entrance in a more logical location.
State.Name: Dubdilla Location Fix

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: Adds a visual effect to all vanilla flies sound emitters.
State.Name: Flies

State.Author: PeterBitt
State.Description: a collection of all my small mods with new ones being added occasionally
State.Name: PeterBitts Small Mods

State.Author: NullCascade
State.Description: This mod attempts to make water react more to the world. When using MGE XE's water, different weathers will produce different wave heights. Water visibility also changes with depth, an effect that can be countered with Night Eye.
State.Name: Wonders of Water

State.Author: Phobos
State.Description: HD Title Screen and Logo Video.
State.Name: Title Screen and Logo Video Intro Reworked.

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: Adds a visual effect to all vanilla cave drip sound emitters.
State.Name: Cave Drips

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: A small tool to be included in Wabbajack modlists that allows for automation of some post-install steps, designed to make installing lists marginally simpler for users.
State.Name: Kezyma's Wabbajack Post-Setup Tool

Original.Name: Enhanced Water Shader for MGE XE 2.0 Green-Blue Water-45432-2-0.7z

State.Author: Krokantor
State.Description: An improved water shader for MGE XE.
State.Name: Enhanced Water Shader for MGE XE

State.Author: Merlord
State.Description: This mod provides one simple feature: any menu can be exited by right clicking. This includes dialog and barter menus, any service menus, as well as the main menu, save/load menu etc.
State.Name: Right Click Menu Exit

State.Author: Half11
State.Description: The Publicans fixes several places in the vanilla game that were set up like inns (where you can rent rooms), but Bethesda still needed to add the option to rent a room.
State.Name: The Publicans

State.Author: Petethegoat
State.Description: This mod effectively normalizes the player's movement speed, ensuring they run at a consistent speed even during diagonal movement.
State.Name: IMMERSIVE RUN FIX

State.Author: Virnetch
State.Description: Expands the vanilla Quick Menu by adding different hotkeys for holding or double tapping a button and/or when holding a specific button. All hotkeys use the same keys as in vanilla. In total there can now be 81 different hotkeyed items/spells. Requires MWSE 2.1
State.Name: Hotkeys Extended

State.Author: R-Zero
State.Description: With this plugin the player can hear an actual noise when he's under the effects of the Sound magic. Its volume depends on the total magnitude of the effect.
State.Name: Sound Spell Sound Effect

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: Melchior Dahrk
State.Description: This mod replaces all the lava meshes in the vanilla game. Removes alpha blending from lava meshes to eliminate flickering with effects like steam. Synchronizes tiled lava effects to reduce the occurrence of seams found in large lava pools. Adds performance friendly spark particle effects to lava pools. Texture replacer compatible.
State.Name: I Lava Good Mesh Replacer

State.Author: Tixen
State.Description: Adds 3 cut splash screens in widescreen resolution.
State.Name: Widescreen Splash Additions

State.Author: johanrosen
State.Description: Fixes for some issues that I have found.
State.Name: Various Mesh Fixes

State.Author: OperatorJack
State.Description: Using MWSE Lua, adds hotkeys for lockpicks and probes, as well as hotkey cycling options, ordering options, and auto-equip options for activating locked or trapped objects.
State.Name: Security Enhanced

State.Author: Virnetch
State.Description: Adds a fillbar that shows the currently equipped weapon's charge under the weapon condition bar on the HUD. Requires MWSE 2.1
State.Name: HUD Weapon Charge

State.Author: Pherim
State.Description: Keeps the girls in Desele's from dancing off the stage by making them not greet the player as he approaches them.

State.Author: Remiros - Greatness7 - NullCascade

State.Author: abot
State.Description:
Automatically synchronizes linked doors locked/unlocked state on activate, lock/unlock by spell, unlock by lockpick, key.

Should work great with mods like pursuit enhanced allowing NPCs to chase you through doors and give purpose to the lock spell.

Makes loading doors play close sound a short time after opening.

Requires MWSE-Lua
State.Name: Loading Doors Lock Tune

State.Author: Kindi
State.Description: Equipping the amulet will cause hang in the OpenMW engine and crash in the original. The amulet script is repaired here.
